column4: hi, anyone know if ubuntu server 10.04 server need to configure what to allow access from external network?
not sure
thanks.
what problem you facing, i know mysql is locked by remote normally, check iptables rules?
erm, i disable ufw, does iptables still in effect?
yes
erm there is man but it is not in /etc/init.d
make sure firewall aint blocking it, else we will create a rule
also check if router settings are ok
erm, i disable ufw, that the firewall u talking about?
no iptables?
i cant find a way to disable the iptables
and i dont think it is configured also
ok no worries
type this sudo ufw disable
stopped and disable at system startup
can you connect now?
erm, i check it with a open port check tool on the www, still connection timed out
is apche even running :p
ya, i can access from internal network
any idea what could have been causing the connection timed out other that iptables?
can be many reason, wrong port setting, ip stetting , did you try https
erm, nope. havent set it up yet
i try to expose ssh too, it too connection timed out.
